title: How to Report Online Fraud or Cyber Crime
problem_summary: If you face online fraud, hacking, identity theft, or cyber harassment, you can report it through the national cyber crime portal.
who_can_use: Any person affected by cyber crime

step_by_step_procedure.description: Collect all evidence such as screenshots, transaction details, URLs, and communication records.
Visit the National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal.
Register using your mobile number and verify via OTP.
Fill in the complaint form with accurate incident details.
Submit the complaint and note the acknowledgement number.

time_limits: Report as early as possible, preferably within 24â€“48 hours

escalation_path.action: Visit local police station with complaint reference number

tips_and_warnings: Do not delete messages or transaction records
disclaimer: This is general legal information and not legal advice.
